about.title: About
about.description: We make language learning simple, natural, and powerful by combining AI practice with smart tracking.

hero.title: Master Languages Your Way
hero.subtitle: AI-aided language learning that adapts to you. Choose your content, track your words, and practice in meaningful contexts — no gamification distractions.

translation.title: Smart Translation & Grammar Hints
translation.description: Instant, context-aware translations with visual indicators for your proficiency on each word. Learn to translate yourself while tracking your growth.

practice.title: Interactive AI Practice
practice.description: Engage in conversation, read texts, and try exercises designed for your learning style. Practice daily or in guided sessions tailored to your pace.

tracking.title: Personalized Progress Dashboard
tracking.description: Monitor vocabulary, grammar, and conversation growth. Visual cues highlight weak areas, so you know exactly what to practice.

reading.title: Genre-Based Reading
reading.description: Read books and articles in your preferred genres to naturally acquire vocabulary and expressions relevant to your interests.

scenarios.title: Scenario Simulation
scenarios.description: Practice everyday situations — cooking, cleaning, travel, or work scenarios — and build confidence in real-world language use.

why_decyphr.title: Why Misneach?
why_decyphr.description: We combine AI-driven learning with interactive tools so you can focus on understanding, practicing, and retaining language naturally.
points: Learn naturally with conversation-based AI exercises
Check hints for any text, and see proficiency indicators on each word
Practice guided sessions or free-form, based on your learning style
Read and absorb language through your favorite genres
Simulate real-life scenarios to prepare for practical communication
Track your growth effortlessly with smart dashboards
Practice anytime, anywhere, with flexible AI-driven exercises
Customize content to your interests and learning goals
Focus on learning, not gamification, to make progress meaningful

step1.title: Pick Your AI Companion
step1.description: Choose a character bot that matches your target language, interests, and learning goals. Decide if you want a casual conversation or structured practice.

step2.title: Engage in Real Conversation
step2.description: Chat, read, and complete exercises with interactive AI. Practice texts, books, or scenarios that matter to you, with hints and proficiency feedback.

step3.title: Track & Improve
step3.description: Monitor your vocabulary and grammar growth. Use the dashboard to focus on weak spots and reinforce what matters most, while keeping practice enjoyable.

step4.title: Daily or Guided Practice
step4.description: Start a timed session every day, or choose what you want to practice based on your learning style. Keep learning consistent, flexible, and effective.

stats.body: These stats summarise your vocabulary: total words, average familiarity, and recent activity.

pagination.title: Pagination

import.title: Import words
import.help: Paste words separated by commas or new lines.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.short: Shows how familiar you are with a word based on usage and recency.
confidence.long: Confidence reflects how often and how recently you have encountered a word in your reading or input. It is calculated automatically and is not a test score or a measure of correctness.

cefr.title: CEFR level
cefr.short: An estimate based on your vocabulary exposure.
cefr.long: Your CEFR level is estimated from the difficulty of the words in your lexicon and your confidence with them. It is not an exam result and does not measure grammar, speaking, or writing ability. Use it as a progress indicator.
